title: Backend API for issue CRUD
description:
Create FastAPI endpoints for creating, updating, and deleting issues. This enables full issue management from the UI.

Endpoints:
- POST /api/issues - Create new issue
- PATCH /api/issues/{id} - Update issue
- POST /api/issues/{id}/comments - Add comment
- DELETE /api/issues/{id} - Delete issue

checklist.item: Update UI to use new endpoints
